items.title: Here’s the portfolio allocation that’s held up amid market volatility
items.description: Morningstar found diversified portfolios are beating all-stock and basic 60/40 strategies. Here's how it breaks the allocations down.

items.title: Wall Street is in love with this safe haven, dividend play and sees big returns this year
items.description: Strong first-quarter results from this telecommunications company have analysts confident it can navigate an uncertain macroeconomic environment.

items.title: 2 major Wall Street banks love this autonomous driving stock that can withstand trade war
items.description: "We see the tariff risk as manageable and non-US market demand remains strong," Goldman analyst Tina Hou wrote Thursday.

items.title: Analysts are hiking their price targets on this software stock after a blowout earnings report
items.description: Shares added about 8% before the market open on Thursday.

items.title: Bank of America cuts Apple price target on tariff hit, delayed AI rollout
items.description: Apple has also delayed the rollout of Apple Intelligence, its take on AI, several times since 2024.
